actions.description: The agent move up by 1 cell (define which coordinates change)
The agent move down by 1 cell (define which coordinates change)
The agent move left by 1 cell (define which coordinates change)
The agent move right by 1 cell (define which coordinates change)
The agent picks up all parcels from the ground in the cell it is in
The agent puts down on the ground all parcels it is carrying in the cell it is in
